SEO Optimization

Improve your online visibility and attract more qualified customers

In a saturated digital world, simply having a web presence is no longer enough. To succeed, your site needs to be visible to people searching for your products or services. Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is the key to improving your ranking in search results, increasing your organic traffic, and generating more conversions.

At My Web Dev Company, I offer comprehensive SEO services tailored to your specific goals, industry, and budget. Through a methodical approach and proven techniques, I help your business stand out in search results and attract qualified traffic.

Boost your online visibility

My SEO optimization services

SEO Audit

A comprehensive SEO audit is the first step to understanding your site's current situation. I deeply analyze your online presence, identify technical issues, evaluate your content, and examine your backlink profile to determine opportunities for improvement.

The audit includes analysis of site structure, loading speed, mobile optimization, meta tags, content quality, and much more. You receive a detailed report with concrete and prioritized recommendations.

Need an SEO audit? Contact me

Technical SEO

Technical SEO involves optimizing your site's infrastructure to facilitate crawling and indexing by search engines. I improve technical aspects that directly impact your ranking: site speed, URL structure, schema.org markup, XML sitemap, robots.txt file, etc.

I also resolve technical issues such as 404 errors, incorrect redirects, canonicalization problems, and optimize your site for mobile devices and Google's Core Web Vitals.

Improve your site's technical SEO

Content SEO

Quality content is at the heart of an effective SEO strategy. I develop a content strategy based on thorough research of keywords relevant to your business and target audience.

My services include optimizing existing pages, creating new optimized content (blog articles, service pages, case studies), improving title and heading structure, and optimizing meta tags to maximize your visibility in search results.

Optimize your content for SEO

Off-page SEO

Off-page SEO concerns all actions taken outside your site to improve your online authority and reputation. I develop strategies to obtain quality backlinks from relevant and authoritative sites in your industry.

My services include creating attractive content to generate natural links, outreach to influencers and potential partner sites, optimizing your social media profiles, and managing your online reputation.

Strengthen your off-page SEO

Local SEO

For businesses targeting a local clientele, local SEO is essential. I optimize your presence in local searches to attract customers in your geographic area.

My services include creating and optimizing your Google My Business listing, improving your visibility in local search results, managing customer reviews, and optimizing your site for specific local queries.

Develop your local visibility

SEO and Eco-design

Did you know that eco-design and SEO are closely linked? An eco-designed website offers many benefits for your search engine ranking:

  • Improved loading speed, an important ranking factor for Google
  • Optimized user experience, reducing bounce rate
  • Clean and lightweight code, facilitating crawling by search engines
  • Better mobile compatibility, essential for modern SEO
  • Reduced resource consumption, improving overall performance

All my SEO services integrate eco-design principles for a dual benefit: improving your ranking while reducing your site's environmental impact.

Performance Tracking and Analysis

SEO optimization is an ongoing process that requires regular monitoring:

  • Setting up analytics tools (Google Analytics, Search Console)
  • Position tracking for your target keywords
  • Analysis of organic traffic evolution
  • Measuring conversion rates and ROI
  • Monthly reports detailing progress and upcoming actions
  • Strategic adjustments based on collected data

I provide you with clear and transparent reports so you can see the concrete impact of my services on your online visibility.

Frequently Asked Questions about SEO

How much do SEO optimization services cost?

The cost of SEO services varies depending on the scope of the project, competition in your industry, and your goals. A basic SEO audit can start from $600, while monthly SEO support generally ranges between $1,000 and $3,000 per month depending on the intensity of actions required. I always provide you with a personalized quote after analyzing your specific needs and your site's current situation.

How long does it take to see results in SEO?

SEO is a medium to long-term investment. Initial results can generally be observed after 3 to 6 months of work, but significant and lasting improvements often manifest after 6 to 12 months. Some technical actions may have a faster impact, while work on content and backlinks takes longer to bear fruit. I provide you with realistic goals and a transparent timeline from the beginning of our collaboration.

Do you guarantee first position on Google?

No, and beware of anyone who makes this promise! No serious SEO professional can guarantee a specific position in search results, as search engine algorithms are complex and constantly evolving. What I guarantee is the application of best practices and a progressive improvement of your online visibility through ethical and sustainable methods (white hat SEO).

What are your SEO methods?

I exclusively use ethical SEO techniques (white hat) in compliance with Google's recommendations. My methodology includes an in-depth analysis of your site and market, technical optimization of your site, creation and improvement of quality content, development of relevant backlinks, and regular performance monitoring. I constantly adapt to algorithm evolutions and industry best practices.

Does SEO work for all types of businesses?

Yes, but the strategy must be adapted to your industry, audience, and objectives. Whether you're a local SMB, a national company, or an e-commerce business, SEO can help you reach your target audience. Some sectors are more competitive than others, which can influence the time and investment needed to achieve results. I advise you on the most relevant strategies for your specific situation.

How do you measure the success of an SEO campaign?

The success of an SEO campaign is measured through several key indicators: improved positions for your target keywords, increased organic traffic, improved conversion rates, reduced bounce rate, and ultimately, the impact on your revenue. I set up tracking tools and provide you with regular reports detailing these metrics and their evolution.

Should SEO continue once good positions are achieved?

Absolutely! SEO is not a one-time project but an ongoing process. Search engine algorithms are constantly evolving, and your competitors are also working to improve their ranking. Maintaining and improving your positions requires regular work: content updates, adaptation to new search trends, strengthening your backlink profile, and continuous technical optimization.

How does SEO integrate with my overall marketing strategy?

SEO is an essential element of an effective digital marketing strategy. It works in synergy with other channels such as social media, content marketing, email marketing, and paid advertising. I adopt a holistic approach that integrates SEO into your overall strategy to maximize your online visibility and generate a steady flow of qualified leads.

What happens if I change SEO providers?

If you're already working with another provider, I can perform a transition audit to evaluate the work done and identify opportunities for improvement. I ensure that the transition happens smoothly, without data loss or negative impact on your search ranking. All reports and access belong to you, and I provide complete documentation on the actions taken.

Does SEO work for new websites?

Yes, and it's even ideal to think about SEO from the creation of a site! For new sites, I implement a fundamental SEO strategy that establishes solid foundations: optimized structure, quality content targeting the right keywords, relevant meta tags, and smooth user experience. Although results take longer for a new domain, starting with good foundations significantly accelerates the process.

How do you stay up to date with Google's algorithm changes?

I keep constantly informed of industry developments through active monitoring: following Google's official announcements, participating in specialized conferences, subscribing to professional resources, and exchanging with the SEO community. This monitoring allows me to quickly adapt my strategies to new algorithm updates and anticipate future trends in search engine optimization.

Ready to improve your online visibility?
